title: Banked curve allows car to travel higher speed

content.question: The car is now going around a banked curve, as shown in the figure above. The banked curve is higher toward the outside of the circular turn. The car can now travel at a higher speed without sliding because the banked curve

choices.label: increases the coefficient of friction between the car and the track.
increases the momentum of the car.
allows a component of the normal force to point toward the center of the track.
allows a component of the weight of the car to point toward the center of the track.
allows gravity to do work on the car.

content.answer: allows a component of the normal force to point toward the center of the track.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
